title: Burnout is costly, investing in employee wellbeing pays off.
description:
Burnout is costly, investing in employee wellbeing pays off.

By normalizing mental health conversations, providing targeted training, regularly reviewing wellbeing initiatives, and encouraging time off, organizations can build a resilient workforce. The result? Higher engagement, increased productivity, and a culture where employees feel supported every day.

https://hubs.ly/Q03NM-Wt0
